markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Walls](/Rules.aspx?ID=2813)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 94 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Natural cave walls are rough and uneven, with nooks, crannies, and ledges. Since most caves are formed by water, cave walls are often damp, making them even more difficult to Climb.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Walls
